function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential contamination of influent and effluent water with MgV and PEDV","Impact":"Risk of spreading MgV and PEDV in the built environment","Mitigation":"Implement strict quality control measures for influent and effluent water treatment","Technologies":"Water treatment and disinfection technologies","People":"People in the vicinity of the water treatment facilities","Owner":"Water treatment facility management"},{"Description":"Non-significant differences in virus recovery rates between influent waters","Impact":"Potential lack of accuracy in virus detection in influent waters","Mitigation":"Enhance the virus detection method through process improvements and validation","Technologies":"Advanced virus detection and quantification technologies","People":"Water quality analysts, researchers","Owner":"Research institutions, water treatment facility management"},{"Description":"Significant differences in virus recovery rates between effluent waters","Impact":"Risk of contaminating the environment with PEDV and MgV through effluent water discharge","Mitigation":"Implement enhanced effluent water treatment and quality control measures","Technologies":"Effluent water treatment technologies, virus disinfection technologies","People":"Environmental regulators, water treatment facility management","Owner":"Environmental regulatory bodies, water treatment facility management"}]}
